verbs.description: Under the amendment 's fourth stipulation , it [V: would] only take Vice President Mike Pence and 13 of President Donald Trump 's 24 Cabinet members to depose him .

[ARGM-LOC: Under the amendment 's fourth stipulation] , it [ARGM-MOD: would] [ARGM-ADV: only] [V: take] [ARG1: Vice President Mike Pence and 13 of President Donald Trump 's 24 Cabinet members] [ARG1: to depose him] .
